data.system_settings: iPhone 6s, iOS 11.2.2 | iPad Air 2, iOS 11.2.5 PB 6
data.actual_result: You can only see the image but not the thumbnail.
data.expected_result: Thumbnail and image should be shown.
data.short_description: Rich embeds: Thumbnail not shown when there is an image
data.steps_to_repro: - Create an rich embed with a bot or webhook - Add an image and a thumbnail to the embed - Observe the outcome with your iOS device
